summary: A struggling circus finds salvation in the form of an exciting new twist on their high-wire act.
cast: Ben Lyon|Anne Crawford|David Farrar|Herbert Lom|Frederick Burtwell|William Hartnell|Josephine Wilson|Elsie Wagstaff|J.H. Roberts|Aubrey Mallalieu|Patricia Laffan|Peter Noble|Jack Sharp|Cecil Ayres Trio|Victor Wood
title: Trágica sugestión
